message: I propose a fair split. I take 90, you take 10. Let's get this over with.
I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to counter!
I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need a better deal than that. Let's split it 70/30 in my favor. We can still get a decent amount even with inflation.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. Your turn to counter again!
